dmca.title: Bomb Dropped in Newshole
dmca.body:
[private]
KCSB-FM
P.O.Box 13401
University of California
Santa Barbara, CA 93107-3401

[private]

It has just come to our attention that you registered a domain name, newshole.info on May 22, 2004.  You may also be using the term "newshole" as well.

Please be advised that "Newshole" has been our registered trademark with the United States Patent Office since 1999 and unofficially in use by us for years before that registration. So it has been obviously in use by us for quite a number of years before your action.

Some preliminary evidence of this would have been seen when you had applied for your domain registration, as we already had .com and .net domains.  A further check would have noted our registered trademark.

Consequently, please cease the use of the term "newshole" immediately as it is unauthorized by us and is a clear violation of our trademark.

[private] President
Multi-Strategy Publishers, Inc.
Box 23, Grand Central P.O.
New York, NY 10163
[private]

------
We repeat:  Cease the use of the term "newshole" immediately.  We shall hold the radio station, university and affiliated principals responsible for any damages to us, when directly or indirectly violating our trademark, which denotes and represents the distribution of very distinctive information characterisitics.
